sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c0f0776edb2f0b405dbe38f0ad961971
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DevSafeUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevSafeUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var DevSafeUtils = Class.create();
DevSafeUtils.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
		this.TOKEN = gs.getProperty('devsafe.githib.token');
		this.GITURI = gs.getProperty('devsafe.githib.uri');
		this.exportedBy = gs.getUserID();
		this.exportedBy_email = gs.getUser().getRecord().getValue('email');
		this.FILENAME = '';
		this.debug = true;
	},
	
	syncMultipleRecords: function() {
		
		var filter = gs.getProperty('devsafe.multiple_record_sync.filter');
		var localUpdateSets = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
		localUpdateSets.addEncodedQuery(filter);
		localUpdateSets.query();
		while (localUpdateSets.next()) {
			DSU.syncSingleRecord(localUpdateSets.getUniqueValue());
		}
	},
	
	syncSingleRecord: function(updateSetSysId) {
		
		var grUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
		if (grUpdateSet.get(updateSetSysId)) {
			try{
				
				// Generate temp retrieved update set based on local update set
				var grRetrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.initialize();
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.description = grUpdateSet.description;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.name = grUpdateSet.name;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.release_date = grUpdateSet.release_date;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.remote_sys_id = grUpdateSet.sys_id;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.application = grUpdateSet.application;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.state = "loaded";
				
				
				var grScope = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
				grScope.get(grUpdateSet.application);
				
				if (grScope.isValid()) {
					grRetrievedUpdateSet.application_name = grScope.name;
					grRetrievedUpdateSet.application_scope = grScope.scope;
					grRetrievedUpdateSet.application_version = grScope.version;
				}
				
				var sysidRetrieved;
				
				if (sysidRetrieved = grRetrievedUpdateSet.insert()) {
					
					// Generate Updates for Temp Retrieved Update sets
					var grUpdateXML = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
					grUpdateXML.addQuery('update_set', updateSetSysId);
					grUpdateXML.query();
					
					while (grUpdateXML.next()) {
						grUpdateXML.remote_update_set = sysidRetrieved;
						grUpdateXML.update_set = '';
						grUpdateXML.insert();
					}
					
					this.FILENAME = encodeURIComponent(grUpdateSet.getValue('name')) + '.xml';
					
					this._uploadUpdateSetToGithub(sysidRetrieved);
					
					// Remove Temporary Retrieved UpdateSets
					
					grUpdateXML = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
					grUpdateXML.addQuery('remote_update_set', sysidRetrieved);
					grUpdateXML.query();
					grUpdateXML.deleteMultiple();
					grRetrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
					grRetrievedUpdateSet.get(sysidRetrieved);
					grRetrievedUpdateSet.deleteRecord();
				}
			} catch (error) {
				var message = error.getMessage();
				this._loggit('syncSingleRecord: '+message);
			}
		}
	},
	
	
	// Upload Function
	_uploadUpdateSetToGithub: function (retrievedUpdateSet) {
		try{
			
			gs.info(encodeURIComponent(this.GITURI + this.FILENAME))
			// check if Update Set already exists
			var sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
			sm.setHttpMethod('GET');
			sm.setEndpoint(this.GITURI + this.FILENAME);
			sm.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + this.TOKEN);
			var response = sm.execute();
			var httpResponseStatus = response.getStatusCode();
			
			
			
			if (httpResponseStatus == 200) {
				gitApiResponse = response.getBody();
				results = JSON.parse(gitApiResponse);
				this._UpdateFile(GlideStringUtil.base64Encode(this._buildUpdateSetXML(retrievedUpdateSet).toString()), results.sha.toString());
			} else {
				// CREATE FILE FUNCTION
				this._CreateFile(GlideStringUtil.base64Encode(this._buildUpdateSetXML(retrievedUpdateSet).toString()));
			}
		} catch (error) {
			var message = error.getMessage();
			this._loggit('_uploadUpdateSetToGithub: '+message);
		}
	},
	
	_buildUpdateSetXML: function(set) {
		
		try{
			
			// get Retrieved Update set
			var tempRetrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
			tempRetrievedUpdateSet.get(set);
			var parentpdateSetXml = this._getXML(tempRetrievedUpdateSet);
			
			// get child updates
			var childUpdateSetXml = this._getChildUpdates(tempRetrievedUpdateSet.sys_id.toString());
			
			// format XML to be retrieved
			parentpdateSetXml = parentpdateSetXml.replace('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>', '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><unload unload_date="' + GlideSysDateUtil.getUMTDateTimeString() + '">');
			
			var updateSetXml = parentpdateSetXml + childUpdateSetXml + '</unload>';
			return updateSetXml;
		} catch (error) {
			var message = error.getMessage();
			this._loggit('_buildUpdateSetXML: '+message);
		}
	},
	
	
	_getXML: function(record) {
		try{
			
			var xml = new GlideRecordXMLSerializer();
			var xmlString = xml.serialize(record);
			return xmlString;
		} catch (error) {
			var message = error.getMessage();
			this._loggit('_getXML: '+message);
		}
	},
	
	_CreateFile: function(CONTENT) {
		try {
			var sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
			sm.setHttpMethod("PUT");
			sm.setEndpoint(this.GITURI + this.FILENAME);
			sm.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + this.TOKEN);
			var body = {
				"message": "Creating snow-update-set-sync...",
				"committer": {
					"name": this.exportedBy,
					"email": this.exportedBy_email
				},
				"content": CONTENT
			};
			sm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));
			sm.execute();
		} catch (error) {
			var message = error.getMessage();
			this._loggit('_CreateFile: '+message);
		}
	},
	
	_UpdateFile: function(CONTENT, SHA) {
		try {
			var sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
			sm.setHttpMethod("PUT");
			sm.setEndpoint(this.GITURI + this.FILENAME);
			sm.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + this.TOKEN);
			var body = {
				"message": "Syncing snow-update-set-sync...",
				"committer": {
					"name": this.exportedBy,
					"email": this.exportedBy_email
				},
				"content": CONTENT,
				"sha": SHA
			};
			sm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));
			sm.execute();
		} catch (error) {
			var message = error.getMessage();
			this._loggit('_UpdateFile: '+message);
		}
	},
	
	_getChildUpdates: function(parentSet) {
		try{
			
			var updatesXML;
			var updates = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
			updates.query('remote_update_set', parentSet);
			while (updates.next()) {
				if (updatesXML)
					updatesXML += this._getXML(updates).replace('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>', '');
				else
					updatesXML = this._getXML(updates).replace('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>', '');
			}
			return updatesXML;
		} catch (error) {
			var message = error.getMessage();
			this._loggit('_getChildUpdates: '+message);
		}
	},
	
	_loggit: function(message){
		if(this.debug){
			gs.info('DevSafe: '+message);
		}
		
	},
	
	type: 'DevSafeUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-12 14:03:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c0f0776edb2f0b405dbe38f0ad961971</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevSafeUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c0f0776edb2f0b405dbe38f0ad961971</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-15 15:25:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
